title: Help with Chat box in Replays
body:
I just recently downloaded the new client (waited since I was afraid that my computer will crash just like the first time I tried it) and I was surprised to see a lot of new features including practice tool and replays on my usual games. So I decided to give this replay feature a try and overall I liked it.

However, my main issue with it is that I couldn't seem to move my chat box. It appears that the chat box is behind part of my HUD so I couldn't fully read what it says due to the HUD blocking it. I wanted to move the box onto a different position, yet I couldn't find a way to do so. I even tried looking online but I didn't get what I was looking for.

Does anyone here know how to move the chat box in the replay feature or is it permanently positioned as is? Thanks for your help!

replies.body:
I'm not sure if this is just because of where my chat was previously placed because of my HUD preference, but if you hit **ENTER** to begin typing in chat, you'll see a blue bar at the top of the chat box that you can then grab and position the chat box with. I've provided a screenshot to show what I mean:

https://imgur.com/a/oA3eF

Let me know if this worked!

Thanks for your help, but unfortunately that wasn't the solution I was looking for. I am sorry that I did not specify it, but the problem with my chat box is only in the replay system. While in game, I can move my chat box freely, but when watching some replays of my previous games, the replay system HUD is blocking the chat box. I tried the enter technique as well as trying to look through some of the options within the system, but I just can't seem to move my chat box around.

Is it possible that there is an option/command which I overlooked or is the chat box permanently placed in that certain position in all my replays?

Below is the link to a photo of what my chat box looks like in the replay system (sorry it isn't a screenshot as I currently have problems with my computer when it comes to that).

http://imgur.com/a/CzFQH

Again, thanks for your effort to help me!

You should be able to hit **ENTER** to call up the chat box frame (the blue bar) even in replays, since I was able to do so on my PC. From your screenshot, it seems the blue bar should be visible in replays after hitting the enter key. After that, you can grab the blue bar and move the chat box where you want it.

If that still doesn't end up working for you, please let me know what behavior you're seeing when you try.

Lol it works now for some reason. Strange, the first time I tried the ENTER method nothing happened. Maybe my replay system was just lagging...

Thanks for your help! I appreciate it!
